clinical_study.brief_title: Seroprevalence Hepatitis E Infection in Healthy Blood Donors
clinical_study.official_title: Observational Study on Seroprevalence of Hepatitis E Infection in Healthy Blood Donors in the Canton Ticino

collaborator.agency: Clinical Trial Unit Ente Ospedaliero Cantonale

brief_summary.textblock: This is a HEV seroprevalence in the health donors in the Canton Ticino study. The pre-donation sampling pouch of each blood donor coming form the Cantone Ticino region will be collected and tested for HEV serology (IgM and IgG).

detailed_description.textblock: Pre-donation sampling pouch of fresh and stored frozen plasma collected within the last 5 years will be tested for HEV IgG serology at the National Reference Laboratory of the Blood Transfusion Services SRC in Berne Collected data will be used to determine HEV seroprevalence, actual and in the last 5 years, in the Canton Ticino and to investigate trend and pattern of the HEV infection (seroprevalence by different regional areas, comparison with national HEV data, and correlation with age, sex and place of residence).

primary_outcome.description: HEV incidence assessed through a single periferal blood sample from each donor

secondary_outcome.measure: change in the blood incidence of HEV
secondary_outcome.description: Determine the change in the incidence of HEV in the Canton Ticino region in the last 5 years analysing the blood sample of the donors.

secondary_outcome.measure: Geogarphical distribution of the HEV measured in the blood sample
secondary_outcome.description: Determination of the distribution of the HEV infection in different geographical areas of the Canton Ticino analysing donor blood samples

secondary_outcome.measure: Trend of the HEV infection measured in the blood sample
secondary_outcome.description: Evaluation of the trend of the HEV infection in the CantoneTicino compared to other Swiss cantons

intervention.description: Collection of one sampling pouch from each blood donor

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy and voluntary blood donors
- Subjects living in the Canton Ticino
- Inclusion criteria for blood donation
- Signed informed consent of the STCRS SI for blood donation
Exclusion Criteria:
- Exclusion criteria for blood donation
